data.title: Behind the fence: look into the future
data.meta_description: Test your knowledge with fun and interesting facts about the Sydney Metro project.
data.text:
Test your knowledge with fun and interesting facts about the Sydney Metro project.

46

stations

46 new state of the art, fully accessible metro stations

History under Sydney Harbour

The first of two metro railway tunnels deep under Sydney Harbour has been completed in a historic milestone for public transport in Sydney.

Tunnel length

Australia’s longest railway tunnels

How many doors will open when the train stops at the station?

36 doors will open when the train stops.

Quiz finished.

Travel Calculator

The travel calculator calculates the number of minutes for a journey during stage 1 and stage 2 of the Sydney Metro development. Select a stage and search for a start and end location to find out how many minutes it will take below. The number of minutes is displayed below.

Stations

Work at Waterloo Station gives a glimpse of life in Sydney in the 1800s.

Sydney Metro City & Southwest tunnels

15.5

km

15.5km of twin tunnels are being constructed from Chatswood to Sydenham

379,000

tonnes

379,000 tonnes of concrete will be made to produce almost 100,000 segments that will line the twin rail tunnels

100,000

segments

Almost 100,000 concrete segments will be made into almost 16,500 concrete rings

100

%

Almost 6 million tonnes of crushed rock is estimated to be generated for re-use from the Sydney Metro City & Southwest project.

Featured news

Sydney Metro City opening soon

Sydney is set to experience fast, safe, reliable metro trains through the city later this month, with the landmark Sydney Metro City project opening soon. More details about the opening date will be provided as they are available.

Sydney Metro City opening soon

First look at new stations and precincts for Sydney Metro – Western Sydney Airport

The proposed design of four stations and precincts along the Sydney Metro – Western Sydney Airport alignment have been revealed, with the community now invited to have their say.

First look at new stations and precincts for Sydney Metro – Western Sydney Airport

First look at Barangaroo's newest waterfront precinct

From next week, Sydneysiders can enjoy the city’s newest waterfront precinct ahead of Barangaroo’s first transport link opening in August.

First look at Barangaroo's newest waterfront precinct

Sydney Metro operations centre doubles in size to support City services

Sydney Metro’s expanded Operations Control Centre (OCC) has been unveiled at the Sydney Metro Trains Facility in Tallawong ahead of service starting on the Sydney Metro City & Southwest in August.

Sydney Metro operations centre doubles in size to support City services
